org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection
Interface MethodInvoker

All Known Implementing Classes:
MethodInvokerTemplate, TargetSiteWrapper
public interface MethodInvoker

The external behavioural contract for custom method invocations.

Nested Class Summary
static class MethodInvoker.NoMethodInvoker
          Final Class that represents "no method invoker" in a ProxyDelegated annotation instance.
 
Method Summary
 ExceptionHandlingPolicy getExceptionHandlingPolicy()
          Get the ExceptionHandlingPolicy associated with this invoker.
 MethodSignature getMethodSignature()
          Gets the MethodSignature representing the target site.
 Object handleInvocation(Object delegate, Object... objects)
          Handles the invocation of a wrapped method, called with the supplied delegate and additional items making up the formal argument list.
 void setExceptionHandlerPolicy(ExceptionHandlingPolicy exceptionHandlerPolicy)
          Sets the ExceptionHandlingPolicy associated with this invoker.
 void setTypeConverter(TypeConverter converter)
          Sets a TypeConverter that will be used to marshal between the return type of the target site (see getMethodSignature()) and another (expected) type.
